name: skyadvnt
story:
Sky Adventure was produced by SNK in 1989.

Choose between four plans to repel the attack of Colonel Claud. Flying over various terrain you are attacked from the air and the ground from a variety of flying machines, animals, plants, and huge boulders. Score is kept on an "Act" basis, and a higher score at the end of each act will net you larger bonus, as in an extra ship or more fire power.

While you are required to choose your plane at the beginning of each ACT you can swap it on the fly!
